resources.string: Select tasks and settings to import
Some selected tasks to restore have the same name as the currently existing tasks. Overwrite the following tasks with imported tasks?
Failed to import, check the Message tab for errors.
Delete all existing tasks before import
Import task list and app settings
An attempt to auto-save the synchronization settings has failed

The account name, account password or ZIP password used in the following tasks failed to import. If you auto-save the sync task and then reinstall the app, you will not be able to decrypt your account name, account password, and ZIP password. Edit the sync task and retype the user login settings.
Protect backup file with a password
Enter password for the settings backup file.

If you proceed, the following data will be recorded in the log file:\nAndroid version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings, App information

Send log file by E-Mail to the developer. The log file contains Android version, Device name, Directory name, File name, SMB Account name, IP address, Network interface name, System settings and App information.
1.Press the Preview button to check the conents of the temp_log.txt file that will be sent (if the selection screen of the application is displayed, then select the FAVORIT application to display the text file.)
2.When you are done reading the file to send, select the E-Mail in EMail selection dialog.
3.Please enter a problem/question in the E-Mail body and send an E-Mail (the log file is attached in zip format)
If you forget your password please initialize or reinstall the application.
If you forget your password, you will need to initialize or reinstall the application. Continue ?
Specify remote server name or IP address.
Specify port number of remote server.
Local directory name contains the %s character. Invalid character removed.
The requested operation was ignored during synchronization.
Failed to create settings backup file: %s
Failed to restore profile. Filename %s was not found.
When a task is renamed, the task name in the schedule is also changed.
When the task is deleted, the task name in the schedule is also deleted.
The task name contains invalid characters: \"%s\"
Task name cannot be longer than %1$s chars. Current: %2$s
Sync canceled: received request from external app is not a string
Generation of remote file list cancelled.
An error occurred while creating the SMB file list.
Please fill in the details of your problem or question about SMBSync2.
Example: The sdcard is not recognized by SMBSync2.
There is no description about your problem/question. Do you want to send it anyway?
The selected storage path is located under the application data folder. This directory, and any data you have saved there, will be deleted when the application is uninstalled.
Disable this warning (can be enabled again in user interface settings)
Warning about using the application data folder
Access point lists are not available
Access point lists are not available
Access point lists are no longer available due to compliance with the Google Play privacy policy, hence the wireless AP option has been changed to \"Has private addr\".
Access point list is no longer available to comply with the Google Play Privacy Policy. Please edit the sync task and change it to \"IP Address List\" etc.
Disable this warning (can be enabled in sync settings)
Failed to launch activity to allow SDCARD write permission.
You cannot synchronize until you allow write to SDCARD. Task=%s
To access the SDCARD: Tap \“SDCARD\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n\nIf the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
To access the SDCARD: Tap \“SDCARD\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n\nIf the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
The root directory of the SDCARD was not selected. Do you want to reselect?
A storage location that can not be used by SMBSync2 has been selected. Do you want to select SDCARD instead?
You can not use SDCARD with SMBSync2 because there is no mount point. Mount point=%s
Failed to launch activity to allow USB media write permission.
USB media is not mounted. Close the screen and then mount the USB media to perform the operation.
A mount point /storage/%s could not be found. SMBSync2 is unable to use this USB media.
%s you cannot synchronize until you allow write to USB media.
To access the USB media: Tap \“USB\” (1), then tap \“Select\” (2).\n\nIf the "Open From" panel is not displayed, tap the menu button in the upper left corner.
The root directory of the USB media was not selected. Do you want to reselect?
SDCARD was selected. Do you want to reselect USB storage?
The application cannot be started because you have not been granted permission to access the internal storage.
Grant permission to access internal storage to be able to read and write data that is synchronized and for the management of application settings.
No sync tasks available for execution. Please create a sync task.
Do you want to delete all history?
Do you want to delete the following history items?
History log file could not be found.
You will not be able to see the details because there is no application to display the text file.
Sync task has not been executed.
Master and target folders are identical. You must select different source and destination directory names.
Target folder path is either identical or included in Master folder. You must select a different destination directory or define proper folder filters.
Specify the IP address or host name of the SMB server.
Specify the port number of the SMB server.
Specify the name of the SMB share.
Specify the SMB Host account name and password or password only.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed. Edit the master folder and allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed. Edit the target folder and allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to SDCARD is not allowed. Press "Allow write to SDCARD" to allow writing to SDCARD.
Write to USB Media is not allowed. Edit the master folder and allow writing to USB Media.
Write to USB Media is not allowed. Edit the target folder and allow writing to USB Media.
Write to USB Media is not allowed. Press "Allow write to USB Media" to allow writing to USB Media.
UBS media is not available because there is no USB media mount point.
Warning: A target directory was not specified for this task. Unpredictable deletes or overwrites may occur. Continue?
Start sync only in specified Wifi condition
You must select at least one task to Sync.
One of the selected tasks is invalid and cannot be executed. Please uncheck it and try again. Task name=%s
The specified sync task will not be executed because it was ignored.
Selected task is configured for test only. No files will be copied or deleted. Execute the task?
Press add button to create new sync task.
Set the following tasks to auto-start ?
Set the following tasks to start on-demand ?
One of the selected sync tasks is invalid. You cannot toggle its Auto-Start mode until it is fixed. Task name=%s
If source or destination are located on SMB server: set Start sync only in specified Wifi condition to \"Conn any AP\"?
If source or destination are located on SMB server: set Start sync only in specified Wifi condition to \"Has private address\"?
When target folder is set to ZIP, the master folder must be internal storage. Master folder was reverted to internal storage.
You can\'t use ZIP as a target unless the master folder is on internal storage. Target folder was reverted back.
The selected SMB protocol does not allow connection to the SMB server. Change the protocol to SMBv1, SMBv2/3(2.12) or SMBv2(2.14).
An error exists in the master folder. Please fix it.
An error exists in the target folder. Please fix it.
The user name could not be decrypted while importing the task list. Retype the user name.
The user password could not be decrypted while importing the task list. Retype the user password.
The ZIP password could not be decrypted while importing the task list. Retype the ZIP password.
Append time stamp to ZIP file name
Warning: The sync task settings have changed. Exit without saving?

Reversing the direction of synchronization may result in unexpected deletes of files and directories.\nIt is strongly recommend that you enable Test mode and ensure that no files or directories are removed or replaced unintentionally.
Directory filter has not been specified
Invalid characters have been removed from the specified directory name(\", :, \\, *, <, >, \|)
File filter has not been specified
Invalid characters have been removed from the specified file name (/, \", :, \\, *, <, >, \|)
You must specify a relative path. Starting \"/\" character removed from path name.
Append the sync time/date to the directory name (the keyword will be replaced by the date and time in which the sync was performed)
Append the sync time/date to the file name (the keyword will be replaced by the date and time in which the sync was performed)
Append the photo/video shooting time/date to the directory name (the keyword will be replaced by the date and time in which the photo/video was shot)
Wireless LAN IP address not specified.
Add the currently connected access point
Wireless LAN is not connected to the specified access point.

- include exp: cache/temp;/my*/fo?der
- exclude all cache/temp folders: \cache/temp
- filters can be entered in same line, separated by ";"
- exclude filter wins
- filter all files with specific name: file1;*.txt;*.jpg;file*\n- filters can also be entered in same line, separated by \";\"\n- exclude filter wins

Option \"Remove directories and files excluded by the filters\" is enabled: All files and directories not included by the filters, as well as those that do not exist in the source directory, will be deleted from the destination directory.
The filter path cannot consist of only \"%s\" generic wildcards.
You must specify at least one file filter option.
Min allowed time difference (in seconds) between source and destination files
Skip task if WLAN IP does not match the specified IP address.
Allow sync with all IP addresses (include public)
Remove directories and files excluded by the filters

Warning: all files and folders that do not exist in the Source directory and those that are not included by the defined filters will be deleted from the Target directory !\nIt is strongly recommend that you enable Test mode and ensure that no unexpected files or directories are removed or replaced.
Remove directories and files excluded by the filters
Delete files prior to sync (Mirror mode only)
Size only compare (files are considered different only if size of the source is larger than the destination)
Use file size to determine if files are different
Use time of last modification to determine if files are different
File sync skipped because \"Do not overwrite destination file if it is newer than source file\" option is enabled.
Skip directory and file names that contain invalid characters (\", :, \\, *, <, >, \|)
Obtain last modification time of files from SMBSync2 application custom list
Synchronize the files in root of the master directory (if unchecked, only the folders and their files/subfolders are synchronized).

WARNING: Possible Unexpected Results !\nIf you live in a zone with DST or if you switch TimeZones, target file can wrongly show an older time than the source if it was modified within the DST/TimeZone interval change. It is strongly recommended to enable \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option. Please verify the contents of the file before overwiting it.

Warning: \"Use file size to determine if files are different\" and \"Use time of last modification to determine if files are different\" options are both not selected. This will force the source files to be copied on each sync and overwrite the target files.
Do not overwrite destination file if it is newer than source file
Ignore Day Light Saving Time difference between files
Time difference between daylight saving time and standard time (minutes)
Do not set last modified time of destination file to match source file

When enabled, the last modified time of the target file cannot be set to be the same as the source file. Target file will always appear as newer than the source file. This option is useful when the target cannot set the last modified time.\nIf this option is enabled, you can prevent files from being copied each time by disabling \"Use time of last modification to determine if files are different\" or by enabling the \"Do not overwrite destination file if it is newer than source file\".
Execute sync tasks only when charging
Test mode (do not copy or delete files)

Changing the directory filter version may result in unexpected file deletion or overwriting, which may change the synchronized files. It is highly recommended that you run it in test mode to check it, or create a test folder to check the synchronization results.
Include directory filter must have Master as root path. Either change the filters as \"Exclude\" or remove any leading \"%s\" characters from the below filters:\n%s.
Include directory filter %s must have Master as root path. Either change the filter to \"Exclude\" or remove leading \"%s\".
Whole directory prefix \"%s\" is no longer valid. Replace it by \"%s\" in the below filters:\n%s
Filter %s has old whole directory prefix \"%s\". Replace it by \"%s\" character (exp. %s).
Invalid characters (%s) are present and must be removed from the below filters:\n%s
Filter %s has an invalid character (%s) that must be removed
Invalid \"%s\" only paths must be removed from the below filters:\n%s
Filter %s contains generic only path parts. Please remove the invalid \"%s\" characters.
Please remove the following duplicate filter entries: %s
Please remove the following duplicate filter entries: %s
Use of asterisk characters in file filters is not supported outside the file name. Please remove any "*" char from the path of the below filters:\n%s
Use of * char in file filters is allowed only in the file name. Remove the * chars from the path of this filter: %s
The filters %s contain hidden files but the option \"Include hidden files\" is disabled. No hidden file will be processed unless you enable it in Advanced Options and save the Sync Task.
The filters %s contain hidden folders but the option \"Include hidden directories\" is disabled. No hidden folder will be processed unless you enable it in Advanced Options and save the Sync Task.
Write files directly to the SMB folder without using temporary files
Directory filter has not been specified.
Delete the master directory when it is empty (only when Sync option is Move)
Limit SMB I/O write buffer to 16 KB
In two-way sync, keep a copy of the overwritten file in case of conflict
Two-way sync rules in case of conflicting files
Failed to save the sync settings file: %s
Could not get the list of SMB shares. Please check:\n- the shares configuration on the SMB server side\n- the proper user-name/password needed by the server is provided
The sync settings cannot be saved because the internal encryption key is invalid.\nRecreate internal encryption key?
External storage was not mounted. Some functions will not be available.
Application was restarted after being killed. To disable restart, enable \"Don\'t keep activities\" in Settings > Developer Options.
Application was restarted because it was killed when it moved to the background.
The settings of SMBv1 have been changed. This change will not be effective until the application is restarted. Exit this application now?
It is recommended to restart the application after changing the theme or language. Click \"Restart\" to restart now. If you want to restart it later, click \"Later\"
Please specify a name for the task
Performing maintenance of app data files
Confirm cancel maintenance of app data files?
Maintenance of application data files.\nNo sync tasks can be executed while maintenance of app data files is running. Run the maintenance operation?
Unable to perform maintenance of app data files while sync task is running.
Maintenance of app data files has been cancelled.
%s items deleted from the list of last modified files.
Maintenance of app data files is complete.
Maintenance of app data files has started.
%s history log files have been deleted.
Files and directories not related to history logs have been found in the history log directory. Remove these files?

The image capture time and date cannot be obtained from EXIF data. Use file update time and date instead? (Disable the \"Confirm\" archiving option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm overwrite of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm delete directory \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm deletion of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Confirm moving of file \n%s\n(Disable the \"Confirm before overwrite/delete\" option for this sync task to avoid this message in the future)
Tap here to confirm file archiving.
Tap here to confirm file overwrite.
Tap here to confirm directory delete.
Tap here to confirm file delete.
Tap here to confirm file move.
The last modified time of the file was used because the shooting date and time cannot be obtained from the EXIF/metadata of the file. File=
The last modified time of the file was used because an error occurred in the conversion of the shooting date. File=
Directory filter %s cannot be used. Edit the sync task and fix the invalid filter.
Sync aborted because the target path contains a directory with the same name as the file being copied. File=
Synchronization was cancelled because the length of the file name exceeds 255 characters. File name chars=%s, File name=%s
Sync cancelled because SDCARD is not mounted.
Sync cancelled because SDCARD write permission not granted.
It seems that the SDCARD content is not reflected in the media store. Execute media scan to update the contents of the SDCARD.
setLastModified() failed. Enable \"Do not set last modified time of destination file to match source file\" in sync task options.
Copying the ZIP file to the target file... %s%% done.
Copying the ZIP file to the cache temp file... %s%% done.
File copy ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
File move ignored because the \"Overwrite destination file(s)\" option is disabled for this task.
The source file or directory name contains invalid characters for the destination. Edit name to allow sync. Character=%s
File or directory skipped because source name contains invalid characters. Character=%s
Unable to connect to SMB host address %s
Unable to connect to SMB host %s on port %s
The SMB host name could not be found. Try to use its IP address. Host Name=
Directory ignored because it points to the same folder on both master and destination. Directory=%s
File ignored because it points to the same file on both master and destination. File=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. IP address=%s
Unable to connect to the specified SMB server. IP address=%s, port=%s
The specified SMB server host name could not be found. Host name=
Sync aborted. Wireless adapter does not have the specified IP address.
Sync aborted. Not connected to the specified wireless access point.
Sync aborted. Not connected to a WiFi access point.
Sync aborted. Network address is not a private IP.
Sync aborted. Wireless LAN is off.
Sync aborted. Network address cannot be obtained.
Sync aborted because network address is a public IP (%s). If you want to sync, enable the \"Conn to any Wifi SSID\" in the sync options.
Sync request has been started. Requestor=%s
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN address does not match the specified IP address.
Sync task skipped because wireless LAN is not connected to the specified WiFi access point.
Wireless LAN was turned on to start the planned tasks. The synchronization is set to start after %s seconds...
Source file or directory not found:
# of copies=%s, # of deletes=%s, # of ignores=%s, Elapsed time=%s
# of copies=%s, # of deletes=%s, # of ignores=%s, # of warnings=%s, # of retries=%s, # of errors=%s
Directory sync skipped because of non-allowed read permission. Directory=%s
Sync cancelled because USB media is not mounted.
Specify IP address range, then press the Search button
Select host name or IP address from search results
Start address is greater than end address.
If Wi-Fi is off, enable it to start the scheduled tasks
After Wi-fi is turned on, delay sync by:
Turn off back the Wifi once the scheduled tasks are completed.
First sync will start within the next minute.
Reset interval startup time to last sync event.
Sync on the last day of every month

Warning: If the selected day never occurs in some months, sync will be skipped on those months. Exp: you select 29 and February has only 28 days, or you select 31 and the month only has 30 days. Select \"Sync on the last day of the month\" option to ensure the task is executed on the last day of every month.
Please specify the sync tasks to be scheduled by pressing the ‘Sync list...’ button below.
Some enabled schedules contain errors. Check the \"Schedule\" tab for more details.
The following sync tasks were not found: %s
Sync task was deleted or renamed.
The following sync tasks have errors: %s
Please select at least one day of the week.
Schedule name already exists. Use a different name.
Schedule name is longer than %1$d chars (%2$d)
Sync task have errors that must be fixed.
Do you want to delete the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to enable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Do you want to disable the following item(s)? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
Change the schedule name? The results are immediately reflected and cannot be undone.
The schedule has changed. Exit without saving?
You must select at least one valid schedule.
You cannot execute invalid schedules. Please uncheck the following schedule and try again: %s
One of the selected schedules cannot be executed because of its configured settings. Schedule=%1$s, Error=%2$s
You must enable at least one valid schedule
One of the enabled schedules is invalid and cannot be executed. Please disable it and try again. Schedule=%s
One of the enabled schedules cannot be executed because of its configured settings. Schedule=%1$s, Error=%2$s
Press add button to create new schedule.

Scheduled tasks will not be executed because the scheduling service is disabled. To enable the scheduling service, tap the calendar icon in the top right corner of this window. You must also enable the toggle switch in front of each sync plan to execute.
Do you want to enable the schedule?
Do you want to disable the schedule?
Schedules and WiFi options for multiple tasks will be consolidated to prevent duplicate sync processes.
Because sync task is disabled, it was not possible to start it.
Sync request received from the SMBSync2 scheduler.
Sync request received from the SMBSync2 scheduler, but it was ignored because this task does not exist:
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Sync request received from an external application.
Sync request received from an external application, but it was ignored because the specified sync task does not exist:
Execution aborted because the sync task does not exist.
Execution aborted because no sync task has been specified.
Automatic sync task has been started because no sync task was specified.
Sync request received from a shortcut.
Sync request ignored because it has already been processed. ID=%s
Sync task was ignored because it was in error state. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Sync task was ignored because it was already queued. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Sync task was ignored because it was already queued. Schedule=%s, Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Start sync task request accepted. Task=%s, Requestor=%s
Start sync task request accepted. Schedule=%s, Task=%s, Requestor=%s
The following sync requests were ignored because the previous sync ended with errors or was cancelled.
Only files with following extensions will be archived:
Preview sample of file and directory names based on your selection:
Change the name of the file before archiving it in the target folder.
Create a directory based on the shooting date to store the files.
If the date and time cannot be determined by EXIF data, display a confirmation message.
ZIP files cannot be used as destinations for Archive sync type. Internal storage will be used instead.
The request was ignored because Zip files cannot be used as destinations for Archive sync type.
Record app and task events in a log file
Send event messages to Android Logcat
Application password has not been created yet.
Do you want to remove App password?
Prompt for password on application start
Prompt for password when editing a task
Prompt for password when exporting sync settings
Hide the saved account name and password when editing the SMB sync settings
Require user to reauthenticate after 30 minutes
Always display the multi-pane view in landscape orientation even on a low density screen
Keep the screen on if synchronization is started while the display was turned on.
Continue execution when an error occurs
If the application process is killed, exit cleanly
Wake up device and keep display on when sync starts (enable if sync doesn\'t start or complete during sleep)

string-array.name: settings_notification_message_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Only for tasks that complete successfully
Only for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Only show notifications for tasks that complete with errors
Only show notifications for tasks that complete successfully
The default notification sound has not been set.
Select when to play the default notification sound

string-array.name: settings_playback_ringtone_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Play only for tasks that complete successfully
Play only for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Play default notification sound for all completed tasks
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete with errors
Play default notification sound for tasks that complete successfully
Disable warning when the app settings folder is included in the sync task
Select when to vibrate on notifications

string-array.name: settings_vibrate_when_sync_ended_list_entries
string-array.item: Only for tasks that complete successfully
Only for tasks that complete with errors

resources.string: Vibrate on notification for all completed tasks
Vibrate on notification for tasks that complete with errors
Vibrate on notification for tasks that complete successfully
Keep the Wi-Fi radio awake until sync is completed
